title: Short-Intensive Course for Strengthening Information Literacy Skills in Medical Libraries

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining smartphone-based mobile learning with offline practical training.

learning_goals: Learners independently search for at least three core papers related to specific research topics in medical databases
Learners systematically organize search results and cite them in reference formats
Learners comparatively analyze the latest clinical guidelines required in medical settings from at least two sources

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
